snippet: A new Defense Department study shows the numbers rising to alarming levels. And all the while, the Pentagon’s credibility is sinking.
abstract: Editorial expresses alarm at Defense Dept study showing rising number of sexual assaults in military; contends that report and arrest of Lt Col Jeffrey Krusinski, officer in charge of sexual assault prevention for Air Force, undermine Pentagon's credibility on issue; supports proposal to replace current system of adjudicating sexual assault by taking cases outside victim's chain of command.
lead_paragraph: A new Defense Department study shows the numbers rising to alarming levels. And all the while, the Pentagon’s credibility is sinking.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
